path.description: Path to the directory containing the Kustomization file.

images.description: Images is a list of container images to set or update in the Kustomization file.

image.description: Image name of the repository from which to pick the version. This is the image name Kargo is subscribed to, and produces Freight for.

kind.description: The kind of origin. Currently only 'Warehouse' is supported. Required.

name.description: The name of the origin. Required.
Name of the image (as defined in the Kustomization file).

newName.description: NewName for the image. This can be used to rename the container image name in the manifests.

useDigest.description: UseDigest specifies whether to use the digest of the image instead of the tag.
